name: David vs Goliaths
description:
Welcome to David vs Goliaths.

Fantasy-based Casual Puzzle Game made in a single week.

I hope you enjoy playing it and be sure to leave me your thoughts and ideas for improvement in the comments. :D

TUTORIAL:

Goal of the game is to push back and get rid of all the Goliaths who are trying to invade the human territory.

Player can get rid of them using David's augmented slingshot which is able to launch powerful boulders. There are 3 different boulder types David can use for now:

  • Classic Boulder (classic drag and launch)
  • Slime-Covered Boulder (same as classic boulder, but is much more bouncy)
  • Refined Magic Boulder (Once launched, player has to press space to unleash the explosion that blasts the obstacles away)

ENJOY!
